Literature.Title: Short cationic lipopeptides as effective antibacterial agents: Design, physicochemical properties and biological evaluation
Literature.Author: Azmi F, Elliott AG, Marasini N, Ramu S, Ziora Z, Kavanagh AM, Blaskovich MA, Cooper MA, Skwarczynski M, Toth I

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:50% Cytotoxicity=>15 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>30µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=>30µM),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MIC=>30µM),Staphylococcus aureus NRS 17(MIC=>30µM),Staphylococcus aureus NRS 1(MIC=>30µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>30µM),Streptococcus pneumoniae ATCC 700677(MIC=>30µM),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=30µM),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 51559(MIC=>30µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>30µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=>30µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=>30µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=>30µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>30µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC BAA-2146(MIC=>30µM),Human hepatocellular carcinoma HepG2(50-60% Cytotoxicity=>15µM)
